resources.string: HOPE LANKA is a non-profitable charity movement established in March of 2022. Our aim is to build a better Sri Lanka by helping thousands of innocent people who have been battered by the crisis the country has faced.
Our company takes the full initiative to collect donations and make them available to people who are in need of them through projects and charity runs happening across the Island.
Let\'s get together and build our country as a one family.
+ Donate items ranging from food, medicine and drugs, clothes, stationary and education materials, etc.
+ You can donate brand new items as well as used items which are in a good condition that someone can use.
+ Our teams will categorize them and store them in our warehouses, which will then distributed to people who are in need of them.
+ Donate funds as you wish, which can help someone in need through charity runs.
+ We will save your funds in our secure bank accounts with all your information on the transaction made
+ Our team will utilize the funds to donate it to people who are in need through various charity runs and programs hosted by different clubs and associations Island-wide
